title: DA.Businesscard 2001
content:
This was the 2001 businesscard for Design Alchemy. Featuring a design study of DA. Beta   
a typeface in early development. This particular card was designed by myself for my business partner.   
   
Text is set in Klampenborg by Henrik Kubel.   
   
 ![DA.Businesscard.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417060729im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/908.jpg)
author: designalchemy

comments.content:
Ole, this is nice.   
   
Can you blow it up to see what the arrows around the 'g' say.   
   
bj

Here is the detail of the "g"   
 ![detail.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417060729im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/944.jpg)

Hrant, I take it, you like the 'g' ;)   
   
Sbo
